title.rendered: Bites, Beer, and Banh Mi on October 13

content.rendered:
Did our headline make your mouth water? Second Sunday is pulling out all the stops on October 13th with lots of sweet and savory treats, the Moerlein Beer Garden, and the final Celebrity Chef Series of the season. And of course, you can always buy a tasty snack, pastry, and more from one of our vendors.

Special thanks to Emily Maxwell for all the great photos!

Moerlein Beer Garden

Woodward and Main Street

Enjoy the lovely fall weather with a beer from our wonderful beer garden located at Main Street and Woodward Street, right in the center of the festival. The beer garden will be serving both Moerlein and Hudepohl Oktoberfest beers, as well as the new Moerlein Zeppelin, so grab a beer and browse the vendors, or chill out in the beer garden!

Celebrity Chef Series

Mr. Pitiful’s (1323 Main Street)
2:30 PM

The October Celebrity Chef Series, presented by Pallet23 will feature Chef Billy Grise of Quan HapaÂ andÂ Duy Nguyen, owner of Quan Hapa and Pho Lang Thang. The chef demo, located at Mr. Pitiful’s, will begin at 2:30 PM. There is no cover charge, though seating is limited.


Food Trucks at Second Sunday

Grab a gourmet grilled cheese from C’est Cheese, a slice of crispy, chewy brick oven pizza from Fireside Pizza, and then top it all off with some creamy gelato from Dojo Gelato. Mmmm, so many options!

SSOM runs October 13th from 12-5 PM in historic Over-The-Rhine and is always free and open to the public.
Like us on FacebookÂ for more updates!
